name: meilisearch
description: Meilisearch is a lightning-fast, open-source search engine with instant results and typo tolerance. It exposes a simple REST API and is designed for simplicity, enabling developers to self-host a search service easily.

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: Return search results in milliseconds with as-you-type search experience

features.title: Typo Tolerance
features.description: Automatically handle typos and misspellings to return relevant results

features.title: Faceted Search
features.description: Filter results by categories, tags, or custom attributes for refined searching

features.title: Highlighting
features.description: Automatically highlight matching terms in search results for better visibility

features.title: Ranking Rules
features.description: Customize result relevance with configurable ranking and sorting criteria

features.title: Multi
features.description: Search across content in multiple languages with language-specific optimizations

features.title: Synonyms
features.description: Define synonym groups to improve search accuracy and user experience

features.title: Geo
features.description: Filter and sort results by geographic location with radius-based queries
